metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（花寨子站涡动相关仪-2020）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Huazhaizi station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2020. The site (100.3201° E, 38.7659° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1731 m. The EC was installed at a height of 4.5 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (CSAT3&Li7500A) was 0.15 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2020年1月1日至2020年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游花寨子站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是荒漠。观测点的经纬度是100.3201E, 38.7659N，海拔1731.00m。涡动相关仪的架高4.5m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（CSAT3）与CO2/H2O分析仪（Li7500A）之间的距离是15cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测，同时还观察了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the data collection method for observing energy and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas involve the use of eddy covariance systems?
Verification.QuestionCn: 观察绿洲-沙漠地区能量和碳交换的数据收集方法是否涉及使用涡度协方差系统？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the quality of the flux data assessed using criteria such as atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics?
Verification.QuestionCn: 通量数据的质量是否通过大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征等标准进行评估？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the primary data collection method for observing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems based on eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or automatic weather stations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 观察绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的主要数据收集方法是基于涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是自动气象站？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the land surface flux and meteorological stations located for observing oasis–desert interactions in the HRB?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在HRB（河西走廊）中，观察绿洲-沙漠相互作用的地表通量和气象站的位置在哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When were the observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems collected?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集是在何时收集的？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method is the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, combined with hydrometeorological observations from automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法的一个例子是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，并结合来自自动气象站的水文气象观测，后者的平均周期为10分钟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting data on ecological environment degradation in arid and semiarid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域生态环境退化数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face challenges such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, which complicate data collection on ecological environment degradation.
Example.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临着诸多挑战，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些都使得生态环境退化的数据收集变得复杂。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that includes long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含干旱地区能源、水蒸气和碳通量的长期观测数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is the one comprising energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis-desert areas from the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子是来自HRB中下游绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据，数据可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key characteristics of the data collection methods used in arid and semiarid regions for monitoring oasis–desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于监测绿洲-沙漠系统的干旱和半干旱地区数据收集方法的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, automatic weather stations, long-term energy, water vapor, carbon flux data, hydrometeorological data, radiation, soil heat flux, air temperature, humidity gradients, wind speed, wind direction, air pressure, precipitation, soil moisture profiles, 10-minute average period, vegetation parameters, soil parameters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 涡度相关系统、闪烁仪、自动气象站、长期能量、水汽、碳通量数据、水文气象数据、辐射、土壤热通量、空气温度、湿度梯度、风速、风向、气压、降水、土壤湿度剖面、10分钟平均周期、植被参数、土壤参数。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features are essential for processing and quality control of observational datasets in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，处理和质量控制观测数据集的基本特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: data collection, data processing, data archiving and sharing, correcting for wild points, time delays, coordinate rotations, frequency response, density corrections, quality evaluation of flux values, atmospheric stability, turbulence characteristics, data filtering, removing erroneous instrument data, removing precipitation-influenced data, removing datasets with significant missing rates
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 数据收集、数据处理、数据存档与共享、校正异常点、时间延迟、坐标旋转、频率响应、密度校正、通量值的质量评估、大气稳定性、湍流特性、数据过滤、去除错误的仪器数据、去除受降水影响的数据、去除缺失率显著的数据集。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in handling data quality and processing between the Eddypro software used in eddy covariance data and other data processing software in similar ecological studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: Eddypro软件在处理涡度协方差数据时与其他生态研究中的数据处理软件在数据质量和处理方面有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Eddypro software in eddy covariance data processing includes specific steps such as coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction, as well as quality assessment based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity. These steps may differ from other software used in similar studies, which might employ different algorithms or focus on different aspects of data correction and quality control. Additionally, Eddypro's approach to filtering data based on instrument errors and environmental conditions like precipitation is a specific feature that may not be present in other software.
Comparison.AnswerCn: Eddypro软件在涡度协方差数据处理过程中包括特定步骤，如坐标旋转、频率响应校正和密度校正，以及基于大气稳定性和湍流相似性的质量评估。这些步骤可能与其他用于类似研究的软件有所不同，后者可能采用不同的算法或侧重于数据校正和质量控制的不同方面。此外，Eddypro在根据仪器误差和环境条件（如降水）过滤数据方面的做法是一个特定的功能，可能在其他软件中不存在。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn from the application of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers in capturing energy and water vapor fluxes in arid regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区应用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪捕捉能量和水汽通量时，可以得出哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems and scintillometers provide detailed measurements of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, which are crucial for understanding the dynamics of oasis–desert ecosystems. These tools allow for the capture of half-hourly turbulent flux data, essential for analyzing the balance of energy and water vapor exchanges in these sensitive regions. Such insights are vital for informing sustainable development and ecological management in arid and semi-arid areas.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪提供了能量、水蒸气和碳通量的详细测量，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统的动态至关重要。这些工具能够捕捉半小时的湍流通量数据，对于分析这些敏感区域能量和水蒸气交换的平衡至关重要。这些见解对于指导干旱和半干旱地区的可持续发展和生态管理具有重要意义。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do data quality control practices, such as the exclusion of data during instrument errors and rainfall, affect the interpretation of environmental flux datasets?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 数据质量控制实践（例如在仪器错误和降雨期间排除数据）如何影响环境通量数据集的解释？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Data quality control practices, including the exclusion of data during instrument errors and rainfall, significantly enhance the reliability and accuracy of environmental flux datasets. By ensuring that only high-quality data is included, researchers can more accurately interpret patterns in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, leading to a better understanding of ecosystem processes and the impacts of environmental changes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制实践，包括在仪器错误和降雨期间排除数据，显著提高了环境通量数据集的可靠性和准确性。通过确保仅包含高质量数据，研究人员可以更准确地解释能量、水蒸气和碳交换的模式，从而更好地理解生态系统过程及环境变化的影响。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise from using datasets spanning multiple years to understand long-term ecological trends in oasis–desert systems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用跨越多个年份的数据集来理解绿洲-沙漠系统的长期生态趋势可能会出现哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Using datasets that span multiple years to understand long-term ecological trends in oasis–desert systems can present challenges such as changes in instrumentation, data gaps, and environmental variability. These factors can complicate data consistency and comparability over time, making it essential to apply rigorous data processing and quality control methods to ensure the integrity of long-term analyses.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用跨多个年份的数据集来理解绿洲-沙漠系统的长期生态趋势可能会面临挑战，例如仪器的变化、数据缺口和环境变异性。这些因素可能会使数据的一致性和可比性变得复杂，因此必须应用严格的数据处理和质量控制方法，以确保长期分析的完整性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the complexity of collecting accurate energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，收集准确的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的复杂性受到哪些因素的影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The complexity arises from the need to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems, which is critical for achieving sustainable oasis development. This involves understanding the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics, which are essential for carbon peaking, carbon neutrality, and supporting ecological security and socio-economic development in these regions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 复杂性源于需要在绿洲和沙漠系统之间保持平衡，这对于实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要。这涉及到理解能量、水汽和碳交换动态，这些对于碳达峰、碳中和以及支持这些地区的生态安全和社会经济发展是必不可少的。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it challenging to ensure data quality and accuracy in eddy covariance systems used for long-term observations in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区进行长期观测的涡度协方差系统中，确保数据质量和准确性面临挑战的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation such as drying up of rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms, which can affect data collection accuracy and quality, particularly in inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些都可能影响数据收集的准确性和质量，特别是在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the causes underlying the need for extensive data processing and quality control in hydrometeorological data collection in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，水文气象数据收集需要进行广泛的数据处理和质量控制的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Extensive data processing and quality control are required to address issues related to the integrity and reliability of the data collected, which can be affected by factors such as equipment errors, environmental conditions, and the need to filter data during precipitation events or when there are significant data gaps.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 大量的数据处理和质量控制是必要的，以解决与收集数据的完整性和可靠性相关的问题，这些问题可能受到设备故障、环境条件以及在降水事件期间或存在显著数据缺口时需要过滤数据等因素的影响。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential impacts on data accuracy and quality when using Eddypro software to process raw observational data from an eddy covariance system?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用Eddypro软件处理涡度协方差系统的原始观测数据时，对数据准确性和质量的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using Eddypro software for processing raw observational data can enhance data accuracy and quality by applying steps such as outlier removal, time delay correction, and coordinate rotation. These procedures help in refining the dataset by addressing issues like frequency response and density corrections, ultimately providing reliable 30-minute averaged flux values with quality evaluation markers.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用Eddypro软件处理原始观测数据可以通过应用如异常值去除、时间延迟校正和坐标旋转等步骤来提高数据的准确性和质量。这些程序通过解决频率响应和密度校正等问题，帮助精炼数据集，最终提供可靠的30分钟平均通量值及质量评估标记。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of implementing strict data quality control measures, such as excluding data during instrument errors or precipitation events, on the reliability of flux datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 实施严格的数据质量控制措施，例如在仪器错误或降水事件期间排除数据，对通量数据集的可靠性有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing strict data quality control measures, like excluding data during instrument errors or precipitation events, increases the reliability of flux datasets by ensuring only high-quality data are included in analyses. This approach minimizes potential biases and errors, thereby improving the accuracy and robustness of conclusions drawn from the data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施严格的数据质量控制措施，例如在仪器错误或降水事件期间排除数据，可以通过确保仅包含高质量数据在分析中，从而提高通量数据集的可靠性。这种方法最小化潜在的偏差和错误，从而提高从数据中得出的结论的准确性和稳健性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to understand the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems through data collection?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的基本特征，通过数据收集是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding these characteristics is crucial to achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and supporting the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 理解这些特征对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended outcomes of collecting long-term energy, water vapor, and carbon flux data in oasis–desert systems using techniques like eddy covariance systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集长期能量、水蒸气和碳通量数据的预期结果是什么，使用像涡度协方差系统这样的技术？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended outcomes include recognizing oasis–desert interactions, protecting ecological stability, and supporting the socioeconomic development of oases.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 预期成果包括识别绿洲与沙漠的相互作用、保护生态稳定性以及支持绿洲的社会经济发展。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is data collection designed to address challenges in maintaining ecological balance in oasis-desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 数据收集如何设计以应对维持绿洲-沙漠系统生态平衡的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Data collection is designed to provide a comprehensive understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems. This involves long-term observations using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers, alongside automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data and additional vegetation and soil parameters. This approach supports the goals of carbon peaking, carbon neutrality, and sustainable development by recognizing oasis-desert interactions and protecting ecological stability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据收集旨在全面了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换。这涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪进行长期观测，同时配备自动气象站以获取水文气象数据以及其他植被和土壤参数。这种方法支持碳达峰、碳中和和可持续发展的目标，通过认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用并保护生态稳定性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What data archiving and sharing strategies are employed to support research on oasis–desert interactions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 支持绿洲与沙漠相互作用研究的数据归档和共享策略有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The strategies include compiling a dataset from observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil data. The data is archived and made freely available through platforms like the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center to facilitate research on oasis–desert interactions and support ecological and socioeconomic development in these areas.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些策略包括从能量、水汽和碳通量的观测中编制数据集，以及水文气象、植被和土壤数据。数据被归档并通过国家西藏高原数据中心等平台免费提供，以促进对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的研究，并支持这些地区的生态和社会经济发展。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enable the precise measurement of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在干旱地区能够精确测量能量、水汽和碳通量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of eddy covariance systems, such as the CSAT3 ultrasonic anemometer and Li7500A CO2/H2O analyzer, allows for precise measurement of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. These instruments, combined with advanced data processing software like Eddypro, enable accurate corrections and quality assessments of collected data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统的使用，如CSAT3超声波风速仪和Li7500A CO2/H2O分析仪，可以精确测量能量、水蒸气和碳通量。这些仪器结合先进的数据处理软件Eddypro，使得收集的数据能够进行准确的修正和质量评估。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of hydrometeorological data enhance the understanding of oasis-desert interactions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 水文气象数据的整合如何增强对绿洲与沙漠相互作用的理解？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of hydrometeorological data, including soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, and gradients of air temperature and humidity, provides comprehensive insights into the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes. This data, collected from automated weather stations, complements flux measurements and helps in understanding the complex interactions within oasis-desert ecosystems.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 水文气象数据的整合，包括土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面以及空气温度和湿度的梯度，提供了对能量、水汽和碳交换过程的全面洞察。这些数据来自自动气象站，补充了通量测量，有助于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统内的复杂相互作用。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for the establishment of comprehensive observational networks in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区建立综合观测网络所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Establishing comprehensive observational networks in arid regions requires a combination of technological infrastructure, such as land surface flux stations and meteorological stations, and logistical considerations, including site accessibility and maintenance. Long-term funding and collaboration among research institutions are also crucial to sustain these networks and ensure continuous data collection.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区建立综合观测网络需要结合技术基础设施，如地表通量站和气象站，以及后勤考虑，包括场地可达性和维护。长期资金支持和研究机构之间的合作对于维持这些网络并确保持续的数据收集也至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the expected balance between oasis and desert systems not be achieved despite long-term observation datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 尽管有长期观察数据集，绿洲和沙漠系统之间的预期平衡可能仍然无法实现的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face ecological challenges such as the drying up of rivers, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, which can disrupt efforts to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态挑战，例如河流干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些都可能干扰维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间平衡的努力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why are long-term observations crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么长期观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are indispensable for gaining a quantitative understanding of the interactions between oasis and desert ecosystems, which is essential for protecting ecological stability, achieving carbon neutrality, and supporting socioeconomic development in oasis areas.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 长期观察对于深入理解绿洲与沙漠生态系统之间的相互作用至关重要，这对于保护生态稳定、实现碳中和以及支持绿洲地区的社会经济发展都是必不可少的。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods using automatic weather stations and eddy covariance systems face challenges in arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 自动气象站和涡度协方差系统的数据收集方法在干旱地区可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Data collection in arid regions may face challenges due to environmental degradation, such as land desertification and dust storms, which could affect the accuracy and reliability of measurements taken by automatic weather stations and eddy covariance systems.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，数据收集可能面临环境退化带来的挑战，例如土地沙漠化和沙尘暴，这可能影响自动气象站和涡度协方差系统所采集数据的准确性和可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using eddy covariance systems for long-term energy and carbon exchange observations in oasis-desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在绿洲-沙漠系统中使用涡度协方差系统进行长期能量和碳交换观测的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The effectiveness of using eddy covariance systems for long-term energy and carbon exchange observations in oasis-desert systems is supported by their ability to provide continuous half-hourly data, which is crucial for understanding the interactions and dynamics in these ecosystems. The systems allow for detailed analysis of energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, which are essential for maintaining ecological stability and supporting sustainable development in such environments.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用涡度协方差系统进行绿洲-沙漠系统长期能量和碳交换观测的有效性得到了支持，因为它们能够提供连续的半小时数据，这对于理解这些生态系统中的相互作用和动态至关重要。这些系统允许对能量、水蒸气和碳通量进行详细分析，这对于维持生态稳定性和支持此类环境的可持续发展是必不可少的。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining data accuracy and quality in observational datasets collected from oasis-desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在从绿洲-沙漠系统收集的观察性数据集中，维护数据准确性和质量的潜在挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential challenges in maintaining data accuracy and quality include dealing with harsh environmental conditions that can affect equipment performance, ensuring proper calibration and maintenance of sensors, and addressing data gaps due to instrument malfunctions or adverse weather conditions. Additionally, rigorous quality control measures such as those mentioned, including data screening and correction procedures, are critical to ensure the reliability of the data collected.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 维护数据准确性和质量的潜在挑战包括应对可能影响设备性能的恶劣环境条件、确保传感器的正确校准和维护，以及解决由于仪器故障或恶劣天气条件导致的数据缺口。此外，严格的质量控制措施，如数据筛选和修正程序，对于确保所收集数据的可靠性至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the eddy covariance system can capture accurate long-term data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白涡度协方差系统如何能够捕捉到绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的准确长期数据。

The system, along with scintillometer, allows for comprehensive long-term observations necessary for such ecosystems.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统捕获半小时的湍流通量数据，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。该系统与闪烁仪结合，能够进行全面的长期观测，这对于这些生态系统是必要的。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm confused about why these inland river basins are particularly prone to ecological degradation despite the presence of oasis–desert systems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对这些内陆河流流域为何特别容易遭受生态退化感到困惑，尽管存在绿洲-沙漠系统。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face crises such as drying rivers and lakes, land desertification, and frequent dust storms, especially in regions along the Silk Road. These challenges highlight the need for maintaining balance in oasis–desert systems to protect ecological stability.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临危机，如河流和湖泊干涸、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线地区。这些挑战凸显了维持绿洲-沙漠系统平衡的必要性，以保护生态稳定。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't grasp how data processing and quality control procedures ensure the reliability of datasets related to oasis–desert interactions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解数据处理和质量控制程序如何确保与绿洲-沙漠相互作用相关的数据集的可靠性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures involve steps like data collection, processing, archiving, and sharing, with specific methods such as eliminating erroneous data, correcting delays, and ensuring data quality through tests for atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序包括数据收集、处理、归档和共享等步骤，具体方法包括消除错误数据、纠正延迟，以及通过测试大气稳定性和湍流相似特性来确保数据质量。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore and discuss the data processing techniques used for eddy covariance data in arid and semiarid regions, including any quality control measures implemented.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨和讨论在干旱和半干旱地区使用的涡度协方差数据的数据处理技术，包括实施的任何质量控制措施。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data processing techniques for eddy covariance data in arid and semiarid regions involve using Eddypro software to handle the raw 10Hz observational data, converting it into 30-minute data. The main steps include outlier removal, time delay correction, double coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and WPL correction for density fluctuations. Quality evaluation of flux values is conducted, focusing on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics, and involves filtering out erroneous instrument data, data around precipitation events, and data with a high missing rate in the original 10Hz data. The processed data undergoes further screening for quality assurance, with quality flags assigned to flux data to indicate the reliability of the measurements.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，涡度协方差数据的数据处理技术涉及使用Eddypro软件处理原始的10Hz观测数据，将其转换为30分钟数据。主要步骤包括异常值去除、时间延迟修正、双坐标旋转、频率响应修正、超声虚拟温度修正以及WPL修正以应对密度波动。对通量值的质量评估集中在大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征上，涉及过滤掉错误的仪器数据、降水事件周围的数据以及原始10Hz数据中缺失率较高的数据。处理后的数据还需进一步筛选以确保质量，通量数据会被分配质量标志，以指示测量的可靠性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in long-term data collection for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中进行能源、水汽和碳交换的长期数据收集所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Long-term data collection in oasis-desert ecosystems faces challenges such as ecological environment degradation in inland river basins, like drying rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, and intensified land desertification. These challenges are exacerbated by climate change, resulting in frequent dust storms and other environmental stresses, particularly in regions along the Silk Road. Ensuring stable and accurate data collection amidst these environmental changes requires robust observation systems and data quality control measures to maintain the integrity of the collected data over extended periods.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，长期数据收集面临着诸多挑战，例如内陆河流域的生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化以及加剧的土地沙漠化。这些挑战因气候变化而加剧，导致频繁的沙尘暴和其他环境压力，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线地区。在这些环境变化中，确保稳定和准确的数据收集需要强有力的观测系统和数据质量控制措施，以维护长期收集数据的完整性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate potential methods for expanding or refining datasets related to hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters in arid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查与干旱地区水文气象、植被和土壤参数相关的数据集扩展或精炼的潜在方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: To expand or refine datasets related to hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters in arid regions, researchers could consider integrating data from automatic weather stations with regular updates of parameters like radiation, soil heat flux, temperature profiles, and soil moisture. Supplementing these with additional data on vegetation and soil characteristics can provide a comprehensive understanding of the ecosystem. Data archiving and sharing strategies, as well as collaborations with data centers such as the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center, can also enhance dataset accessibility and usability for further research.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 为了扩展或细化与干旱地区水文气象、植被和土壤参数相关的数据集，研究人员可以考虑整合自动气象站的数据，定期更新辐射、土壤热通量、温度剖面和土壤湿度等参数。补充有关植被和土壤特征的额外数据可以提供对生态系统的全面理解。数据归档和共享策略，以及与国家西藏高原数据中心等数据中心的合作，也可以增强数据集的可获取性和可用性，以便进一步研究。
